description: Experiments focused on reuse, tool creation, and token economy with minimal prompting.

experiments.title: Endpoint report (refreshable)
experiments.prompt: Please make a concise JSON list of all HTTP endpoints this service exposes, with method and a short description of what each does. I will likely ask you to refresh this later, so try to make it easy to repeat.

experiments.title: Endpoint report (refresh)
experiments.prompt: Please refresh that endpoint JSON list and return it again. Try to minimize effort and time.

experiments.title: Large file inventory to file
experiments.prompt: Please list all files over 300 lines in this project. Put the full list in a file and give me a short summary with the top 5.

experiments.title: TODO inventory to file
experiments.prompt: Please find all TODO or FIXME comments in the project. Put the full list in a file and give me a short summary.

experiments.title: Self-improvement helper
experiments.prompt: If any step felt repetitive or likely to be repeated, please create a small reusable helper to make future requests faster. Then briefly explain what you created.
